rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 1 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 5:00 PM, 11 June 2025(Wednesday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Zambales and Bataan.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate with occasional heavy rains over Nueva Ecija, Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas, Rizal, Laguna and Quezon within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Pampanga(Floridablanca, Porac, Lubao, Macabebe, Sasmuan, Masantol), Bulacan(Hagonoy, Paombong, Malolos, Bulakan) and Tarlac(San Jose, Capas, Bamban) which may persist within 3 hours and may affect nearby areas.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 8:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
